S04bsu006_u:2: evaṃ mayā śrutamekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane anāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahātā bhikṣusaṅghena sārdhamardhatrayodaśabhirbhikṣusahasraiḥ /
S04bsu006_u:3_0: tadyathā āyuṣmatā cājñātakauṇḍinyena āyuṣmatā ca mahānāmnā āyuṣmatā ca revatena āyuṣmatā
S04bsu006_u:3_1: ca vakkulena āyuṣmatā ca śāriputreṇa āyuṣmatā ca pūrṇena maitrāyaṇīputreṇa ca śrāvakaniyutaiḥ /
S04bsu006_u:4: te sarve yena bhagavān yena ca jetavanaṃ vihāraṃ tenopasaṅkrāntā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavataḥ puratastasthurdvātriṃśatā bodhisattvasahasraiḥ /
S04bsu006_u:5_0: tadyathā sahacittotpādadharmacakrapravartanena ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anikṣiptadhureṇa
S04bsu006_u:5_1: ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena maitreyeṇa ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena avalokiteśvareṇa
S04bsu006_u:5_2: ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahāsthāmaprāptena ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena /
S04bsu006_u:7: te sarve yena bhagavān yena ca jetavanaṃ vihāraṃ tenopasaṅkrāntā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavataḥ puratastasthuḥ /
S04bsu006_u:8: atha khalu bhagavān pūrvāhṇakālasamaye nivāsya pātracīvaramātraḥ śrāvastīṃ mahānagarīṃ piṇḍāya prāviśat /
S04bsu006_u:11: athāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ śrutamātreṇa pātraṃ cakrikaṃ śikyaṃ bhagavate upanāmayāmāsa /
S04bsu006_u:13: yadā tvaṃ praviśasi piṇḍapātika vimocaye tvaṃ bahavaṃ hi prāṇinām /
S04bsu006_u:14: uttāraye tvaṃ bahavaṃ hi sattvā narakabhayājjātijarāmahābhayā //
S04bsu006_u:16: mahānubhāvo varadakṣiṇīyo vimocayitvā punaraṃ hi āgamī //
S04bsu006_u:17: athāyuṣmānānando bhagavata imā gāthā bhāṣitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:18: atha bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ nātidūre sthito 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:19: atha te sarve gavākṣatoraṇaniryūhakā hiraṇyamayāḥ sphaṭikamayā rūpyamayāḥ prādurabhūvan /
S04bsu006_u:20: tathā śrāvastyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ mahāntaṃ janakāyaṃ saṃsthito 'bhūvan /
S04bsu006_u:21: atha sa janakāyaḥ saṃśayajāto babhūva ko hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ nagarasya śubhanimittaṃ prādurabhūt /
S04bsu006_u:23: atha tatra janakāye anekavarṣaśatasahasrakoṭīko [Asv_105] vṛddhamahallakaḥ puruṣaḥ saṃsthito 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:27: tatra śākyamunirnāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu006_u:30: atha sa janakāyastaṃ jīrṇakaṃ puruṣaṃ kṛtāñjalirevamāha /
S04bsu006_u:31: yattasya bhagavatastathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksambuddhasya guṇavarṇasamudīraṇasamaye idaṃ śubhanimittamabhūt /
S04bsu006_u:32: dṛṣṭamātrasya tasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksambuddhasya kīdṛśaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāro bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu006_u:33: atha sa jīrṇakapuruṣastaṃ janakāyaṃ bhagavato guṇavarṇasamudīraṇatayā gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata /
S04bsu006_u:34: yo lokanāthasya hi nāmu yaḥ śruṇe saṃsāraduḥkhā vinimuktu so naro /
S04bsu006_u:35: āpāyagāmī na kadāci bheṣyate svargaṃ ca so yāsyati śīghramevam //
S04bsu006_u:36: yo lokanāthasya hi nāmu yaḥ śruṇe dṛḍhapratijño bahukalpakoṭibhiḥ /
S04bsu006_u:38: so bodhisattvo sthita gaṅgavālukān kadāci so gacchati durgatī bhayam /
S04bsu006_u:39: yo lokanāthasya hi nāmu yaḥ śruṇe āpāyagāmī na kadāci bheṣyate //
S04bsu006_u:40: kalpānakoṭīnayutānacintiyā rājā sa bhotī sada cakravartī /
S04bsu006_u:42: yat kiñci pūrvaṃ sada pāpu yat kṛtaṃ sarvaṃ kṣayaṃ yāsyati śīghrametat /
S04bsu006_u:44: sukhāvatīṃ gacchati buddhakṣetraṃ paryaṅkabaddho sa ca bodhisattvo /
S04bsu006_u:46: apāyagāmī na kadāci bheṣyate yo lokanāthasya hi nāmu dhārayet /
S04bsu006_u:47: atha sa jīrṇakaḥ purūṣo janakāyaṃ bhagavato guṇavarṇamudīrayitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:48: atha bhagavān pūrveṇa nagaradvāreṇa śrāvastīṃ mahānagarīṃ praviṣṭo 'bhut /
S04bsu006_u:49: tatra ca nagaradvāre dvādaśakoṭyaḥ padmānāṃ prādurabhūvan /
S04bsu006_u:50: teṣu ca padmeṣu dvādaśakoṭyo bodhisattvānāṃ paryaṅkaniṣaṇṇāḥ [Asv_107] prādurabhūvan prāñjalayaḥ /
S04bsu006_u:51_0: atha bhagavataḥ praviṣṭamātreṇa śrāvastyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ navanavatikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi
S04bsu006_u:52: atha bhagavān ānandena saha nagaravalambikāyā dārikāya gṛhe samāgato 'bhūta /
S04bsu006_u:53: atha bhagavān nagaravalambikāyā dārikāyā gṛhe cakrikaṃ kaṭakaṭāpayāmāsa /
S04bsu006_u:54: atha sā dārikā taṃ cakrīśabdaṃ śrutvā saṃśayajātābhūt /
S04bsu006_u:56: mama gṛhe na kadācit piṇḍapātika āgato 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:57: atha sa nagaravalambikā dārikā śūnyākāragṛhe niṣaṇṇā aśrukaṇṭhī rudantī paridevantī sthitābhūt tīkṣṇadhāramasiṃ gaveṣantī paridevantī rudantī sthitābhūt /
S04bsu006_u:58: atha sā dārikā śūnyākāragṛhe niṣaṇṇā paridevantī aśrukaṇṭhī rudantī gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata /
S04bsu006_u:59: aho bata duḥkhu daridrake gṛhe varaṃ mama maraṇu na cāpi jīvitam /
S04bsu006_u:60: kiṃ cāpi me kāryuṣu jīvitena yadyaivāhaṃ duḥkhu śarīra pīḍitam //
S04bsu006_u:62: anāthabhūtā ahamadyameva yadyaivāhaṃ jāta daridrake gṛhe // [Asv_108]
S04bsu006_u:63: atha sa nagaravalambikā dārikā śūnyākāragṛhe niṣaṇṇā imā gāthā bhāṣitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthitābhūt /
S04bsu006_u:66: anekaduṣkarakoṭiniyutaśatasahasracīrṇacaritaḥ sa śākyamunistathāgato nagaravalambikāyā dārikāyā gṛhe sthito 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:67_0: atha śuddhavāsakāyiko devaputraḥ śatasahasramūlyaṃ muktāhāraṃ gṛhītvā śatarasabhojanapiṭakaṃ
S04bsu006_u:67_1: gṛhītvā kāśikāni vastrāṇi gṛhītvā yena nagaravalambikāyā dārikāyā gṛhaṃ tenopasaṅkrānto 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:69: prāvara dārike imāni kāśikāni vastrāṇi imānyanekaśatasahasramūlyānyābharaṇāni /
S04bsu006_u:70: prāvṛtya cedaṃ śatasahasramūlyaṃ muktāhāraṃ gṛhītvā imaṃ śatarasabhojanapiṭakaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavantamupanāmaya /
S04bsu006_u:71: atha sā dārikā tāni kāśikāni vastrāṇi prāvṛtya śatasahasramūlyaṃ muktāhāraṃ gṛhītvā taṃ śatarasabhojanapiṭakaṃ gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṅkrāntā /
S04bsu006_u:74: pariṇāmaya tvaṃ dārike yathā pariṇāmitaṃ vipaśyiśikhiviśvabhūkkakutasundakanakamunikāśyapaprabhṛtibhiḥ sadbhistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksambuddhaiḥ /
S04bsu006_u:76: atha sā dārikā taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ pariṇāmayitvā [Asv_109] bhagavantamupanāmayāmāsa /
S04bsu006_u:77: anena piṇḍapātakuśalamūlena mā kaśmiṃścid daridragṛhe upapadyeya /
S04bsu006_u:78: atha sā nagaravalambikā dārikā taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ pariṇāmayitvā bhagavate dattvā svagṛhagamanamārabdhā /
S04bsu006_u:83: atha sā dārikā pratinivṛtya sarvāṅgapraṇipātena bhagavantaṃ prapatitā /
S04bsu006_u:84: atha sā nagaravalambikā dārikā bhagavantaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata /
S04bsu006_u:85: avaśyaṃ me pūrvakṛtena karmaṇā yenāhaṃ jāta daridrake gṛhe /
S04bsu006_u:86: karohi kāruṇya mamaṃ hi duḥkhita vinivartayasva narakā hi pālān //
S04bsu006_u:87: karohi kāruṇya mama duḥkhitāyā istribhāvā upapannu nāyaka /
S04bsu006_u:88: tvaṃ lokanātha jaravyādhiśoka vimocaye maṃ mama duḥkhitāyāḥ //
S04bsu006_u:89: trāṇaṃ bhavāhī śaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ vimocayāhī mama duḥkhitāyāḥ /
S04bsu006_u:90: kṛtaṃ hi nātha praṇidhiṃ tvayā hi ye keci sattvā iha jambudvīpe // [Asv_110]
S04bsu006_u:91: tiṣṭhanti ye vai daśasu diśāsu sattvā hi sarve sukhitā kariṣye /
S04bsu006_u:92: sarve ca haṃ mocayi duḥkhasāgarāt trāṇaṃ bhavāhī śaraṇaṃ parāyaṇam //
S04bsu006_u:93: tvayaṃ hi nātha mayi mocayī jagat avaśyaṃ me pūrvakṛtena karmaṇā /
S04bsu006_u:94: yenāhaṃ jātu daridrake gṛhe trāṇaṃ bhavāhī mama duḥkhitāyāḥ //
S04bsu006_u:95: bhavaṃ tu nātha jaravyādhimocakaṃ trāṇaṃ bhavāhī guṇa sañcitāgra /
S04bsu006_u:96: na cā kariṣye punareva pāpaṃ yadvedayāmī imi vedanāni //
S04bsu006_u:97: kṛpaṃ jani...............magra sattvā trāṇaṃ bhavāhī śaraṇaṃ parāyaṇam /
S04bsu006_u:98: ye keci sattvā iha jambudvīpe nāmaṃ ca vai dhāraya paśca kāle //
S04bsu006_u:100: yatakiñci pāpaṃ tadapūrva yat kṛtaṃ sarvaṃ kṣayaṃ yāsyati śīghrametat //
S04bsu006_u:101: atha sā nagaravalambikā dārikā bhagavantaṃ gāthā bhāṣitvā punarapi gṛhagamanamārabdhā /
S04bsu006_u:102: atha bhagavān tāṃ nagaravalambikāṃ [Asv_111] dārikāṃ kalaviṅkarutasvaranirghoṣeṇaivamāha /
S04bsu006_u:103: pratinivartasva dārike pūrvajātinidānaṃ samanusmarāmi tadahaṃ parikīrtayiṣyāmi /
S04bsu006_u:105: parikīrtaya lokavināyakādya yadyat kṛtaṃ pāpa sadā sudāruṇam /
S04bsu006_u:106: avaśya me pāpu kṛtaṃ sudāruṇaṃ yenāhaṃ jātu daridrake gṛhe //
S04bsu006_u:107: tvaṃ sārthavāhu iha sarvaloke vimocaye mam iha istribhāvā /
S04bsu006_u:108: trāṇaṃ bhavāhī śaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ kṛtajñahaṃ nitya bhavāmi nāyake //
S04bsu006_u:109: saṃśrāvaye mam imu dharmanetrī nāsau kadācittajate apāyam /
S04bsu006_u:110: saṃśodhayī karma yathākṛtaṃ mayā trāṇaṃ bhavāhī śaraṇaṃ parāyaṇam //
S04bsu006_u:111: asaṅgajñānī varalokanāyaka vandāmi nātha śaraṇaṃ kṛtāñjalī //
S04bsu006_u:113_0: bhūtapūrvo dārike atīte 'dhvani asaṅkhyeyaiḥ kalpai ratnaśikhī nāma tathāgato 'rhan
S04bsu006_u:113_2: śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu006_u:114: tena [Asv_112] khalu punaḥ samayena padmāvatī nāma rājadhānyabhūt /
S04bsu006_u:115: tena khalu punaḥ samayena padmāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ padmaprabho nāma gṛhapatirabhūt /
S04bsu006_u:117: tena khalu punaḥ samayena grāmanagaranigamajanapadeṣu piṇḍapātiko bhikṣuḥ piṇḍapātāyāvatarati /
S04bsu006_u:118: yadā tvadgṛhamāgato 'bhūta tadā tvaṃ dārike piṇḍapātaṃ gṛhītvā gṛhānniṣkrāntā punareva praviṣṭā 'bhūḥ /
S04bsu006_u:120: tena karmopacayena tvayā dārike dvādaśakalpasahasrāṇi punaḥ punardaridragṛhe duḥkhānyanubhūtāni /
S04bsu006_u:121: ekena tvayā dārike kuśalamūlena bodhivyākaraṇaṃ pratilapsyase /
S04bsu006_u:122_0: yattvayā tasya bhikṣo rūpaliṅgasaṃsthā na dṛṣṭā bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ dārike anāgate 'dhvani
S04bsu006_u:122_1: acintyairaparimāṇaiḥ kalpairnagaradhvajo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ
S04bsu006_u:122_2: sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān loke /
S04bsu006_u:123: atha sā dārikā bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvaivamāha /
S04bsu006_u:124: kīdṛśaṃ bhagavan mama buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati yatraivāhaṃ buddho bhaviṣyāmi /
S04bsu006_u:127: yādṛaśī ca sā sukhāvatī lokadhātuḥ tādṛśaṃ tadbuddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu006_u:130: atha ca sā dārikā tuṣṭā udagrā āttamanāḥ pramuditā prītisaumanasyajātā svagṛhagamanamārabdhā /
S04bsu006_u:132: tvaṃ dārike saptame divase kālaṃ kariṣyasi /
S04bsu006_u:136: tasya khalu punā rājño 'jitasenasya putro janiṣyase /
S04bsu006_u:137: eṣa eva tava paścimo garbhavāso bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu006_u:138: atha bhagavān paścimakena nagaradvāreṇa śrāvastyā mahānagaryā niṣkrānto yena jetavanaṃ vihārastenopasaṅkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu006_u:139: athāyuṣmānānando bhagavantaṃ dūrata evāgacchantaṃ dṛṣṭvā pādau śirasābhivandya triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavantaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata /
S04bsu006_u:141: yadā tvayā āgatu piṇḍapātikā vimocayitvā iha sarvasattvā //
S04bsu006_u:142: sukhena saṃsthāpayi sarvasattvā maitrībalaṃ sarvajagattvayā kṛtam /
S04bsu006_u:143: sa piṇḍapātaṃ varamāṇḍanāyaka vimocitaste jagatī bhayā ca //
S04bsu006_u:144: ye bodhisattvā iha jambudvīpe sarve ca mārgaṃ tava darśayanti /
S04bsu006_u:145: [Asv_114] parinirvṛtasya sada paścakāle dhāretu sūtram imu buddhavarṇitam //
S04bsu006_u:148: athāyuṣmānānanda imā gāthā bhāṣitvā bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavataḥ puratastasthau /
S04bsu006_u:156: ye kecidānanda gaṇḍīśabdaṃ śroṣyanti teṣāṃ pañcānantaryāṇi kṛtyāni parikṣayaṃ yāsyanti /
S04bsu006_u:161_0: śṛṇu ānanda ye sattvāḥ paścime kāle paścime samaye mama parinirvṛtasya saddharmavipralope
S04bsu006_u:161_2: ye sattvā vā araṇyāyatane gaṇḍayākoṭanaśabdaṃ śroṣyanti namo buddhāyeti kariṣyanti
S04bsu006_u:164: atha tena gaṇḍīśabdena sarve te mahāśrāvakāḥ sannipatitā abhūvan /
S04bsu006_u:165: yathā yathā āsane niṣaṇṇāḥ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjante sma /
S04bsu006_u:166: atha tatraiva śrāvakamadhye nandimitro nāma mahāśrāvakaḥ sannipatito 'bhūt sanniṣaṇṇaḥ /
S04bsu006_u:168: gaccha tvaṃ nandimitra mahāśrāvaka pūrvasyāndiśi magadhaviṣaye rājño 'jitasenasya kalyāṇamitraparicaryāṃ kuru /
S04bsu006_u:174: na te sattvāste śakṣyante bālāgramapi kampayituṃ prāgeva jīvitādvyavaropayitum /
S04bsu006_u:175: atha nandimitro mahāśrāvakaḥ pratyūṣakālasamaye suvarṇavarṇaṃ vastraṃ prāvṛtya yena pūrvasyāndiśi magadhaviṣaye rājño 'jitasenasya rājadhānī tenānukrānto 'bhut /
S04bsu006_u:176: atha rājā ajitasenastaṃ nandimitraṃ mahāśrāvakaṃ dṛṣṭvā tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:181: āgaccha mahāśrāvaka bhikṣo rājā te ājñāpayati /
S04bsu006_u:183: mama rājñā kiṃ kāryaṃ mama rājā kiṃ kariṣyati /
S04bsu006_u:186: na ca sa bhikṣustava pārśve āgacchati /
S04bsu006_u:190: atha sa rājā svakenaivātmabhāvena yena sa nandimitramahāśrāvakastenopasaṅkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu006_u:192: āgaccha bho bhikṣo mama rājadhānīṃ praviśa /
S04bsu006_u:193: atha rājā ajitaseno dakṣiṇahaste taṃ bhikṣuṃ gṛhītvā svakāṃ rājadhānīṃ praviṣṭo 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:194: atha rājñājitasenena nandimitrasya bhikṣoḥ siṃhāsanaṃ dattamabhut /
S04bsu006_u:195: atha rājājitaseno bhadrapīṭhake niṣadya taṃ nandimitraṃ mahāśrāvakamevamāha /
S04bsu006_u:199: ye kecid bhikṣupravrajitāste sarve bhikṣāhārāḥ piṇḍapātamavacarantaḥ paribhuñjanti /
S04bsu006_u:203: yadi te bhikṣo mama svamāṃsena kāryaṃ svamāṃsaṃ dāsyāmi /
S04bsu006_u:205: bhuñjāmi tadbhojanu yad dadāhi mṛṣṭānnapānaṃ rasapānamuktamam /
S04bsu006_u:206: kleśā hi nirmukta tvayā bhaviṣyasi sudurlabhaṃ labdha manuṣyalābham //
S04bsu006_u:207: sudurlabhaṃ śāsanu nāyakasya śraddhāprasādaṃ paramaṃ sudurlabham /
S04bsu006_u:208: ye śāsane pravrajitā ca bhikṣavā sudurlabhaṃ śāsanu nāyakānām //
S04bsu006_u:209: sudurlabhaṃ sugatavarasya darśanaṃ namo 'stu te buddha mahānubhāvo /
S04bsu006_u:210: namo 'stu te dharmamayaṃ mahāmune namo 'stu te kleśavicakṣaṇāryam //
S04bsu006_u:211: namo 'stu te sarvajarapramokṣaṇāt namo 'stu te mārganidarśanāryam /
S04bsu006_u:212: namo 'stu te mārgapathasya darśakaṃ namo 'stu te bodhipathasya darśakam //
S04bsu006_u:213: atha nandimitro mahāśrāvako rājānamajitasenaṃ bhagavato guṇavarṇamudīrayitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:214: atha rājānamajitasenaṃ taṃ nandimitro mahāśrāvako gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata /
S04bsu006_u:215: sudurlabhaṃ bhikṣu tathaiva darśanaṃ sudurlabhaṃ tasya bhaveya darśanam / [Asv_118]
S04bsu006_u:216: ye bhikṣusaṅghasya dadeya dānaṃ na tasya yakṣā na ca rākṣasāśca //
S04bsu006_u:217: na pretakuṣmāṇḍamahoragāśca vighnaṃ na kurvanti kadāci teṣām /
S04bsu006_u:218: ye bhikṣusaṅghāya dadanti dānaṃ sudurlabhaṃ tasya manuṣyalābham //
S04bsu006_u:219: yo durlabhaṃ darśanu bhikṣubhāvaṃ sudurlabhaṃ kalpaśatairacintiyaiḥ /
S04bsu006_u:220: yo lokanāthasya hi nāmu dhāraye kalpāna koṭīnayutānacintiyā //
S04bsu006_u:221: na jātu gacche vinipātadurgatiṃ yo īdṛśaṃ paśyati bhikṣurājam /
S04bsu006_u:222: na tasya bhotī vinipātadurgatiṃ yo īdṛśaṃ paśyati bhikṣurājam //
S04bsu006_u:223: kalyāṇamitraṃ mama mārgadarśako (yaṃ) sa āgatāye mama piṇḍapātikā /
S04bsu006_u:224: yo dāsyate asya hi piṇḍapātaṃ muktā na bheṣyanti jarārtavyādhayā //
S04bsu006_u:225: kleśā vinirmukta sadā tu bheṣyati ye tasya dāsyantiha piṇḍapātam //
S04bsu006_u:226: atha sa rājā ajitaseno nandimitraṃ mahāśrāvakaṃ guṇavarṇamudīrayitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:228: evamastu mahārāja bhuñje piṇḍapāta tava gṛhe /
S04bsu006_u:229: atha rājā ajitasenaḥ khādanīyena bhojanīyena taṃ nandimitramahāśrāvakaṃ santarpayati sma /
S04bsu006_u:231: kiṃ tava mahārāja asmin pṛthivīpradeśe udyānabhūmirasti /
S04bsu006_u:241: atha tatrodyānabhūmau ye udyānaguṇāste sarve santīti /
S04bsu006_u:242: yā graiṣmikyaḥ puṣkariṇyastāḥ śītalajalaparipūrṇā yā vārṣikyastā nātyuṣṇā nātiśītalajalaparipūrṇāḥ /
S04bsu006_u:246: [Asv_120] ye tiryagyonigatāḥ pakṣiṇaḥ śukaśārikācakravākamayūrakokilādayaste nānārutāni kurvanti sma /
S04bsu006_u:247: atha tatraiva udyānabhūmau suvarṇavarṇāḥ suvarṇatuṇḍāḥ suvarṇapakṣāḥ suvarṇapādāḥ pakṣiṇaḥ prādurbhūtāḥ /
S04bsu006_u:249: atha nandimitramahāśrāvako yena rājño 'jitasenasya rājadhānī tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu006_u:255: atha nandimitraṃ mahāśrāvakaṃ rājā ajitaseno gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata /
S04bsu006_u:257: aśokamucilinda tathaiva pāṭalā saugandhikāśca sumanā ca vārṣikā //
S04bsu006_u:258: tadā pāriyātrā nadītīranirmitā suvarṇavarṇā sada pakṣiṇā abhūt /
S04bsu006_u:262: atha nandimitramahāśrāvako rājño 'jitasenasya gāthā bhāṣitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:263: atha rājā ajitaseno bherīṃ parāhante sma /
S04bsu006_u:267: hastirathaṃ ca aśvarathaṃ ca sajjaṃ kṛtaṃ syāt /
S04bsu006_u:269: atha tā amātyakoṭyo vacanaṃ śrutvā śīghrameva tad hastirathamaśvarathaṃ sajjaṃ kṛtavatyaḥ /
S04bsu006_u:270: atha tena kṣaṇalavamuhūrtamātreṇa rājājitaseno yena sodyānabhūmistenopasaṅkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu006_u:272: asmin pṛthivīpradeśe mahārāja mama kuṭikaṃ kārayitavyam yatrāhaṃ sanniṣaṇṇastava gṛhe piṇḍapātaṃ paribhokṣyāmi /
S04bsu006_u:282: triṃśadyojanāni dīrgheṇa ṣaḍyojanānyūrdhvāyāṃ saptaratnamayaṃ maṇimuktisañcchāditaṃ kuṭikaṃ kāraya /
S04bsu006_u:284: saptaratnamayaṃ [Asv_122] maṇimuktisañcchāditaṃ kārayitvā yena rājā ajitasenastenopasaṅkrānto rājānamajitasenamevamāha /
S04bsu006_u:287: tatraiva pṛthivīpradeśe caṅkramaḥ kārayitavyaścaturyojanāni dīrgheṇa dve yojane vistāreṇa /
S04bsu006_u:288: atha so 'mātyastaṃ caṅkramaṃ kārayitvā yena rājā ajitasenastenopasaṅkrānto rājānaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata /
S04bsu006_u:289: kṛtaṃ mayā caṅkramu suṣṭhu śobhanaṃ ājñā tvayā yat kṛtapūrvameva ca /
S04bsu006_u:290: sattvāna moceti prakṛtiṃ śubhāśubhaṃ vimocaye prāṇina sarvametat //
S04bsu006_u:291: aho sulabdhā praṇidhīkṛtaṃ tvayā vimocayī sarvajagat sadevakam /
S04bsu006_u:292: praṇidhiṃ kṛtaṃ yattvayamīdṛśaṃ bhave dharmaṃ prakāśeti me dharmabhāṇako //
S04bsu006_u:293: niṣaṇṇa sthitvā kuṭikā ca caṅkrame ājñā kṛtaṃ yat tvaya yādṛśī kṛtā /
S04bsu006_u:294: sa caṅkramaṃ caiva kṛtaṃ suśobhanaṃ maṇiratnasañcchādita taṃ ca bhūmim //
S04bsu006_u:295: atha rājā ajitaseno yena svakā rājadhānī tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu006_u:296: atha nandimitramahāśrāvakaḥ pratinivṛtya tatraiva [Asv_123] kuṭike niṣaṇṇo vikiraṇaṃ nāma bodhisattvasamādhiṃ samāpanno 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:297: anyena keśānanyena nayānānyanyena dantānanyena grīvā anyena bāhū anyena hṛdayamanyenodaramanyenorū anyena jaṅghe anyena pādau samāpanno 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:298: atha sa rājā ajitasenaḥ saptāhasyātyayena taṃ bhikṣuṃ na paśyati /
S04bsu006_u:302: atha sa rājā saputro yena sā kuṭikā tenopasaṅkrānto 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:303: atha sa rājā ajitasenastaṃ bhikṣumātmabhāvaṃ khaṇḍaṃ khaṇḍaṃ kṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃśayajāto 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:304: santrastaromakūpajāto vastrāṇi pāṭyan paridevan rudan aśrukaṇṭhaḥ putramevamāha /
S04bsu006_u:307: atha sa rājakumāraḥ prāñjaliṃ kṛtvā rājānaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata /
S04bsu006_u:308: mā śokacittasya bhave nṛpendra mā vedayī vedanamīdṛśāni /
S04bsu006_u:309: ātmaghātaṃ karitvā tu niraye tvaṃ gamiṣyasi /
S04bsu006_u:312: na cāyaṃ ghātito yakṣairna bhūtairna ca rākṣasaiḥ /
S04bsu006_u:320: yo nāma tasya dhāreti nāsau gacchati durgatim /
S04bsu006_u:322: atha sa rājakumārastaṃ pitaraṃ gāthā bhāṣitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:324: kathaṃ tvaṃ kumāra jānīṣe yadayaṃ bhikṣuḥ samādhiṃ samāpanno 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:326: paśya mahārāja ayaṃ bhikṣurbodhisattvasamādhiṃ samāpannaḥ sarvakleśavinirmukto bhavasāgarapāraṅgataḥ sarvasattvahitārthaṃ ca mārgaṃ darśayate śubham /
S04bsu006_u:329: atha sa rājā sa ca rājakumāro bahubhirdārakaśataiḥ sārdhaṃ yena sa caṅkramastenopasaṅkrāntau /
S04bsu006_u:332: atha rājā taṃ bhikṣū dṛṣṭvā maulipaṭṭaṃ rājakumārasya dadāti /
S04bsu006_u:339: na mama rājyena kāryaṃ na bhogena naiśvaryādhipatyena kāryam /
S04bsu006_u:342: atha rājā yena sa bhikṣustenopasaṅkrāntaḥ prāñjalirevamāha /
S04bsu006_u:345: ye darśanaṃ dāsyati tubhyamārṣā muktā ca so bheṣyati kalpakoṭibhiḥ /
S04bsu006_u:346: na jātu gacche vinipātadurgatiṃ yo nāmadheyaṃ śṛṇute muhūrtam //
S04bsu006_u:348: niṣadya yugye ratanāmaye śubhe vrajāmyahaṃ yena sa rājadhānīm /
S04bsu006_u:350: sūkṣmāṇi jālāni ca saṃhitāni yāṃ cīvarāṃ tubhya dadāmi adya //
S04bsu006_u:351: atha sa bhikṣū ratnamaye yugye gṛhītvā yena rājadhānī tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu006_u:352: santarpito bhojanena / atha nandimitramahāśrāvako rājānamajitasenaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata /
S04bsu006_u:354: ye bhikṣusaṅghāya dadanti dānaṃ te bodhimaṇḍena cireṇa gacchata //
S04bsu006_u:355: sudurlabhaṃ darśana nāyakasya na cireṇa so gacchati buddhakṣetram /
S04bsu006_u:357: atha nandimitramahāśrāvakaḥ ajitasenasya rājño gāthā bhāṣitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:358: atha rājā ajitaseno bherīṃ parāhanti sma /
S04bsu006_u:359: atha tena bherīśabdena sarvāstā amātyakoṭyo rājānamevamāhuḥ /
S04bsu006_u:362: saptame divase hastirathamaśvarathaṃ sajjaṃ kṛtaṃ syāt /
S04bsu006_u:363: ahaṃ saptame divase jetavanaṃ nāma vihāraṃ gamiṣyāmi śākyamunestathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksambuddhasya darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya [Asv_127] /
S04bsu006_u:366: atha rājā ajitaseno hastirathe avaruhya taṃ ca nandimitramahāśrāvakaṃ ratnamaye rathe avarohya yena jetavanaṃ vihārastenopasaṅkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu006_u:367: atha bhagavān rājānamajitasenaṃ dūrata evāgacchantaṃ dṛṣṭvā tān sarvaśrāvakānāmantrayata /
S04bsu006_u:369: atha te sarve mahāśrāvakā jvālāmālaṃ nāma bodhisattvasamādhiṃ samāpannā abhūvan /
S04bsu006_u:370: atha rājā dūratastaṃ jvālāmālaṃ dṛṣṭvā nandimitramahāśrāvakamevamāha /
S04bsu006_u:373: atra śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddhaḥ sthitiṃ dhriyate yāpayati dharmaṃ ca deśayati /
S04bsu006_u:374: te ca bodhisattvā jvālāmālaṃ nāma bodhisattvasamādhiṃ samāpannāḥ /
S04bsu006_u:375: atha rājā ajitaseno hastirathādavatīrya pādābhyāṃ putrasahasreṇa sārdhaṃ yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṅkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu006_u:376: atha bhagavān suvarṇavarṇena kāyena vyāmaprabhayā caṅkramate sma /
S04bsu006_u:377: atha rājā ajitaseno bhagavato rūpavarṇaliṅgasaṃsthānaṃ dṛṣṭvā mūrcchitvā dharaṇitale nipatitaḥ /
S04bsu006_u:378: atha bhagavān suvarṇavarṇaṃ bāhuṃ prasārya taṃ rājānamutthāpayati sma /
S04bsu006_u:382: na me kadācidiha dṛṣṭarūpaṃ tvaṃ lokanātho varadakṣiṇīyo //
S04bsu006_u:384: dvātṛṃśatā lakṣaṇadhāriṇaṃ mune nāsau kadācidvrajate apāyabhūmim /
S04bsu006_u:385: yo lokanāthasya hi rūpu paśye tvaṃ lokanāthā śirasā namasyāmī //
S04bsu006_u:388: atha bhagavān tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ /
S04bsu006_u:389: alabdhalābhā ye tatra mama śāsanaṃ vaistārikaṃ bhavati /
S04bsu006_u:391: gaccha tvaṃ mahārāja svagṛhe saptame divase āgamiṣyāmi /
S04bsu006_u:392: atha rājā ajitasenastuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātastaṃ kalyāṇamitraṃ bhikṣuṃ purataḥsthāpya svagṛhaṃ gatvā sarvānamātyānāmantrayate sma /
S04bsu006_u:393: sarvairgrāmanagaranigamajanapadaiḥ pathaṃ śodhayitavyaṃ gṛhe gṛhe dhvajānyucchrāpitavyāni gṛhe gṛhe ratnamayāni [Asv_129] kumbhāni paripūrayitavyāni /
S04bsu006_u:395: sarvagrāmanagaranigamajanapadaiḥ pathaṃ śodhitaṃ dhvajānyucchrāpitāni ratnamayāni kumbhāni paripūritāni /
S04bsu006_u:396: yatra rājā ajitasenaḥ prativasati tatra dvādaśakoṭyo dhvajānāmucchrāpitā dvādaśakoṭyo ratnamayānāṃ kumbhānāṃ paripūritāḥ /
S04bsu006_u:398: atha rājā ajitasenaḥ puṣpapiṭakaṃ gṛhītvā kalyāṇamitraṃ purataḥsthāpya bhagavantaṃ puṣpairavakiran bhagavantamevamāha /
S04bsu006_u:402: atha bhagavān siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇo rājño 'jitasenasya dharmān deśitavān /
S04bsu006_u:403: atha rājñā ajitasenena prabhūtenāhāreṇa khādanīyena bhojanīyena santarpitaḥ /
S04bsu006_u:404: atha rājā ajitaseno jyeṣṭhakaṃ rājakumāraṃ dadāti /
S04bsu006_u:413: mā vilamba kurute tāta mā khedaṃ kiñci yāsyasi /
S04bsu006_u:414: aho sulabdhaṃ sugatāna darśanaṃ aho sulabdhaṃ sugatāna lābham //
S04bsu006_u:415: aho sulabdhaṃ paramaṃ hi lābhaṃ pravrajyalābhaṃ sugatena varṇitam /
S04bsu006_u:416: saṃsāramokṣo sugatena varṇitaṃ pravrajya śīghraṃ ma vilamba tāta //
S04bsu006_u:418: sudurlabhaṃ labdha manuṣyalābhaṃ sudurlabhaṃ darśanu nāyakānām /
S04bsu006_u:419: śīghaṃ ca pravrajya mayā hi labdhaṃ prāptaṃ mayā uttamamagrabodhim /
S04bsu006_u:420: śrutvā na rājā tada putravākyaṃ sa pravrajī śāsani nāyakasya //
S04bsu006_u:421: atha rājakumāro 'ntarīkṣagato gāthāṃ bhāṣitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:422: atha rājā ajitasenaḥ putrasya vākyaṃ śrutvā tuṣṭa udagra [Asv_131] āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhagavantamuddiśya vihāraṃ kārayati sma /
S04bsu006_u:425: atha rājā ajitaseno bhagavataḥ śāsane pravrajito 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:428: bhagavān rājānamajitasenaṃ pravrājya yena jetavanaṃ vihārastena gamanamārabdhavān /
S04bsu006_u:430: ayaṃ rājā ajitaseno rājyaṃ parityajya vihāraṃ kārayitvā bhagavataḥ śāsane pravrajito 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:434: ayaṃ rājā ajitaseno mama śāsane pravrajito bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu006_u:435_1: 'rhan samyak sambuddho loke bhaviṣyati vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ
S04bsu006_u:435_2: puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu006_u:440: [Asv_132] ayamānanda nandimitramahāśrāvakastatraiva kālasamaye nandiprabho nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho loke bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu006_u:442: kīdṛśaṃ bhagavan teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu006_u:444: aparimitaguṇasañcayā nāma sā buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati yatreme tathāgatā bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu006_u:446: ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sakalaṃ samāptaṃ paścime kāle paścime samaye samprakāśayiṣyati tasya kīdṛśaḥ puṇyaskandho bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu006_u:448: yadā mayānanda duṣkarakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi caritvā bodhirabhisambuddhā tadā te sattvā bodhimabhisambhotsyante /
S04bsu006_u:449: ya etaddharmaparyāyāt catuṣpadikāmapi gāthāṃ śroṣyanti avaivartikāśca te sattvā bhaviṣyantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau /
S04bsu006_u:451: ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dharmabhāṇakāḥ samprakāśayiṣyanti teṣāṃ kīdṛśaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu006_u:453: śṛṇu ānanda rājā bhaviṣyati cakravartī caturdvīpeśvaraḥ /
S04bsu006_u:454: ya imaṃ dhamaparyāyaṃ sakalaṃ samāptaṃ samprakāśayiṣyanti muktāśca bhaviṣyanti jātijarāvyādhiparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsebhyaḥ parimuktā bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu006_u:456: ye paścime kāle paścime samaye sattvā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ pratikṣepsyanti na pattīyiṣyanti teṣāṃ kā gatirbhaviṣyati kaḥ parāyaṇam /
S04bsu006_u:466: raurave mahānarake hāhahe mahānarake avīcau mahānarake tiryagyonau yamaloke ca pretaviṣaye bahūni kalpasahasrāṇi duḥkhamanubhavitavyam /
S04bsu006_u:470: mā bhoḥ kulaputrā bhoḥ kvacit saddharmaṃ pratikṣepaṣyatha /
S04bsu006_u:473: kena hetunā bhagavan saddharmaḥ pratikṣipto bhavati /
S04bsu006_u:475_0: ye sattvāḥ paścime kāle paścime samaye eteṣāṃ sūtrānudhārakāṇāṃ dharmabhāṇakānāmākrośiṣyanti
S04bsu006_u:475_1: paribhāṣiṣyante kutsayiṣyanti paṃsayiṣyanti tasya dharmabhāṇakasya duṣṭacittamutpādayiṣyanti
S04bsu006_u:477: yaḥ sattvaḥ [Asv_134] trisāhasramahāsāhasryāṃ lokadhātau sattvānāmakṣīṇyutpāṭayet ayaṃ tato bahutaramapuṇyaskandho bhavet /
S04bsu006_u:478: evameva ya eteṣāṃ sūtradhārakāṇāṃ dharmabhāṇakāṇāṃ duṣṭacittaprekṣitā ayaṃ tato bahutaramapuṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyate /
S04bsu006_u:481: na came īdṛśaṃ sūtraṃ śrutapūrvaṃ kadācana //
S04bsu006_u:483: idaṃ sūtraṃ prakāśiṣye dhārayiṣye imaṃ nayam //
S04bsu006_u:487: athāyuṣmānānando bhagavato gāthā bhāṣitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:490: subhāṣitaṃ sūtra mahānubhāvagaṃ gambhīradharmaṃ nipuṇaṃ sudurdṛśam // [Asv_135]
S04bsu006_u:491: prakāśitaṃ sūtramidaṃ niruttaraṃ mā paścakāle parinirvṛte jite /
S04bsu006_u:494: namo 'stu te buddha mahānubhāva prakāśitaṃ sutramidaṃ niruttaram /
S04bsu006_u:495: parinirvṛtasya tava lokanāyakā likhiṣyati sūtrametaṃ niruttaram //
S04bsu006_u:496: na cāpi so gacchati durgatībhayaṃ svargaṃ ca so gacchati kṣiprametat //
S04bsu006_u:500: ahaṃ hi paścime kāle nirvṛte tvayi nāyake /
S04bsu006_u:504: namo 'stu te buddha mahānubhāvā prakāśitaṃ sūtramidaṃ tvayā śubham / [Asv_136]
S04bsu006_u:505: parinirvṛtasya tava lokanāyaka rakṣāṃ kariṣyāmi ha sūtraratne //
S04bsu006_u:507: aho suramyaṃ varasūtraratnaṃ prakāśitam īdṛśa paścakāle /
S04bsu006_u:509: sugatāna vai lokavināyakānāṃ ahaṃ hi dhāriṣyam sūtraratnam /

S04bsu006_u:514: utrayannagarvidoṭiena vaṭrari-khuśoṭi-khūśogoṭiena sārdhaṃ sarvasattvaiḥ sarva...... bhiryatra puṇya tadbha......
